abstract: Construction of Watts Bar nuclear power plant in Tennessee nears completion after 36 years of delays; federal regulators will decide whether to grant it operating license.
lead_paragraph: Federal safety regulators will decide in the coming weeks whether to grant an operating license to the second reactor of the Watts Bar nuclear plant in Tennessee.

headline.main: After 36 Years, Nuclear Plant in Tennessee Nears Completion
headline.print_headline: After Decades, Nuclear Plant Nears Completion

snippet: Federal safety regulators will decide in the coming weeks whether to grant an operating license to the second reactor of the Watts Bar nuclear plant in Tennessee.
